scripts.start: yarn workspace shared build; concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "yarn backend:dev"  "yarn frontend"
scripts.prisma:seed: cd src/backend; npx prisma db seed
scripts.prisma:reset:force: yarn workspace shared build; cd src/backend; npx prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.prisma:reset: yarn workspace shared build; cd src/backend; npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.prisma:migrate:dev: cd src/backend; npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:migrate:prod: cd src/backend; npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.containerize: docker-compose down && docker-compose build && docker-compose up -d && sleep 5 && docker exec database psql -U postgres -c "CREATE DATABASE nerpm;" && yarn prisma:reset:force
scripts.test:frontend: yarn workspace shared build; yarn workspace frontend test
scripts.test:backend: yarn workspace shared build; yarn workspace backend test
scripts.test:setup: node scripts/test-setup.js && docker run --name finishline_test -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=docker -p 5433:5432 -d postgres && sleep 5 && docker exec finishline_test psql -U postgres -c "CREATE DATABASE nerpm;" && yarn prisma:migrate
scripts.test:teardown: docker stop finishline_test && docker rm finishline_test && node scripts/test-teardown.js
scripts.build: yarn run build:backend && yarn run build:shared && yarn run build:frontend
scripts.database:setup: node scripts/database-setup.js && docker run --name finishline -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=docker -p 5432:5432 -d postgres && sleep 5 && docker exec finishline psql -U postgres -c "CREATE DATABASE nerpm;" && yarn prisma:reset
scripts.reset: rimraf yarn.lock; rimraf src/frontend/node_modules; rimraf src/backend/node_modules; rimraf src/shared/node_modules; rimraf ./node_modules;
scripts.install:hard: yarn reset; yarn install; yarn prisma:generate
